metadata.description: "Les souscriptions seront délivrées chez Pissot, quai de Conti, vis-à-vis la descente du Pont Neuf; chez Lambert, rue de la Comédie Françoise; chez Cailleau, quai des Augustins, à l'image St. André; & chez M. Toussaint, rue du Cimetiere St. André"--P. [1] at end
Includes prices with and without subscription
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
